name: unidmvol

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr), wss(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr), wcel(cr, cdm(cvol)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(⋃ dom(vol)= ℝ, ⋃ dom(vol)⊆ ℝ, ℝ ∈ dom(vol))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr)
-| wss(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr)
-| wcel(cr, cdm(cvol))
-| wi(wa(wss(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr), wcel(cr, cdm(cvol))), wceq(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr))
body.pretty:
⊢ ⋃ dom(vol)= ℝ
⊣ ⋃ dom(vol)⊆ ℝ
⊣ ℝ ∈ dom(vol)
⊣ ((⋃ dom(vol)⊆ ℝ ∧ ℝ ∈ dom(vol))→ ⋃ dom(vol)= ℝ)

stmt.origin: mprgbir(hs0, cdm(cvol), wss(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr), wss(cv(hs0), cr))
stmt.pretty: mprgbir(hs0, dom(vol), ⋃ dom(vol)⊆ ℝ, hs0 ⊆ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wss(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr)
-| wb(wss(cuni(cdm(cvol)), cr), wral(hs0, cdm(cvol), wss(cv(hs0), cr)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr))
body.pretty:
⊢ ⋃ dom(vol)⊆ ℝ
⊣ (⋃ dom(vol)⊆ ℝ ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ⊆ ℝ))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(vol)→ hs0 ⊆ ℝ)
